The lab addresses scalability, performance, and resource utilization challenges in existing cloud services while preparing for future challenges with appropriate technologies and architectures. Additionally, the lab aims to understand industry dynamics and technology trends to create a robust ecosystem About the job: Develop components or services for distributed system. • • Implementing unit test for the components. • Conducting manual or automated testing to evaluate the research result. Job Requirements About the ideal candidate: Master degree in Computer Science or Information related majors • focusing on software development and related areas. • Hands-on programming skills in Java or C++/C/Python or other modern programing languages. • Deep understanding on Data structure, Algorithm and Design patterns. • Good understanding of common software system design. • Good written and verbal communication skills for documentation and presentation. Experience in Cloud computing is a plus. • Citizenship Requirement N/A Position Start Date May 06, 2025 12:00 AM APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required?
